特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法: This course will be conducted on campus.   Students will read and analyze paragraphs and essays, and learn or review the grammar, language, and organizational features of academic writing.  Writing will be taught as a process with attention to pre-writing, multiple draft writing, and peer-review.

第1回: Course information; writing diagnostic (all 14 sessions held face-to-face)
第2回: Complete Venn diagrams pre-writing task (approximately 1 hour)
第3回: Comparison-contrast paragraph: diagramming and using comparatives
第6回: Write comparison-contrast revisions / final draft (approximately 1 hour)
第7回: Write problem / solution essay draft 1 (approximately 1 hour)
第8回: Problem / solution mini-essay:  feedback and student examples; essay revisions
第9回: Writing introductions and conclusions; outlining and essay organization
Complete opinion essay pre-writing worksheet (approximately 1 hour)
第10回: Integrating outside source material; opinion essay pre-writing activities
Complete the essay body paragraphs (approximately 2 hours)
第11回: Complete the essay introduction and conclusion paragraphs (approximately 2 hours)
第13回: Make final revision to the complete opinion essay (approximately 1 hour)
